name: Full program
detail: Full program with 9-12 persons per day, including shared and private options.

icon_detail.detail: Bamboo rafting to reach the camp
Information with our Feed & elephants & walk

document.head: Inclusions
document.detail: Transportation, meals, seasonal fruits, water, local insurance, uniforms, food for elephants, photos.

document.head: Total Time
document.detail: Approximately 8-9 hours, including 4.5-5 hours with the elephants.

document.head: Activities
document.detail: Bamboo rafting, elephant feeding, organic medicine preparation, walking and bathing with elephants.

document.head: What to bring
document.detail: spare clothes, swimming suit flipflop, insectspay, sneakers, suncream camera and personal medicine.

document.head: Pick up time
document.detail: 8:30 - 9:00 AM meet u at your place

name: Half Day
detail: Half day program with 9-12 persons per day, focusing on elephant care and feeding.

icon_detail.detail: Information with our Feed & elephants & walk

document.head: Inclusions
document.detail: Transportation, seasonal fruits, water, local insurance, uniforms, food for elephants, photos.

document.head: Total Time
document.detail: Approximately 5-6 hours, including 2-3 hours with the elephants.

document.head: Activities
document.detail: Elephant feeding, organic medicine preparation, bathing with elephants.

document.head: What to bring
document.detail: spare clothes, swimming suit flipflop, insectspay, sneakers, suncream camera and personal medicine.

document.head: Pick up time
document.detail: 6:50 - 7:15 AM Meet u at your place
